ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: I told you my dear that I have information that you must SEE. The spider his eight eyes widening. As for the why part of your question, because if I do not

"I told you my dear that I have information that you must SEE." The 
spider his eight eyes widening. "As for the why part of your 
question, because if I do not show you now then none of us will exist 
to see it later."

He spoke in riddles but everything he'd said was mostly the truth. He 
only withheld information that wasn't important at the moment.

(While I'm thinking about it)
Phobia realized that his link with his babies was still 
active."Babies he thought, rerout signal to the ship I am to receive 
no transmissions unless the ship or the existence of my babies are in 
jeapordy."

Theis spider knew that if the Maximals detected any transmissions 
coming to or from Phobia all deals would be off. He couldn't afford 
any mistakes especially stupid ones.\

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, logomorph@h... wrote:
> ::Savanna::
> 
> She looked at Hysteria. " The engines are a minor loss.  It would 
> have been better to lose the engines than to loose the ship with 
all 
> hands on board."  She looked at Phobia, knowing that the pred knew 
> too much already.  "Why have you come here Phobia? Why is it so 
> important that we know whatever it is that you wish to tell us?"
> 
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, firefox_y2k@h... wrote:
> > Hysteria jogs over to Kluster, the various weapons on her back
> > jumping 
> > slightly at the sudden movement:
> > 
> > "What do you mean the engines were ejected?! Why am I, a 
certified 
> > techbot, always the last to know about these things?!"
> > 
> > Hysteria shook her head in mock defeat, the engines! Of all 
things 
> to 
> > lose they had to eject the engines! Now they were stuck on this
> > stupid 
> > rock for Primus knows how long! Great, just great!
> >
